args.natural_language_statement: Let D(n) be the set of all diagonal matrices in GL(n). Show that D(n) is a matrix group. Formalize: For a commutative ring R and n : Type (or n : Fin n?), define D (n : ℕ) (R : Type*) [CommRing R] := { A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) R // A.isInvertible ∧ (∀ i j, i ≠ j → A i j = 0) }. Prove that D(n) is a subgroup of GL(n, R) (i.e., a Matrix group). Translate statement only, ending with := by sorry.

result:
{"ok": true, "lean_translation": "import Mathlib
open Matrix
open LinearMap

/-- Let D(n) be the set of all diagonal matrices in GL(n). Show that D(n) is a matrix group. Formalize: For a commutative ring R and n : Type (or n : Fin n?), define D (n : ℕ) (R : Type*) [CommRing R] := { A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) R // A.isInvertible ∧ (∀ i j, i ≠ j → A i j = 0) }. Prove that D(n) is a subgroup of GL(n, R) (i.e., a Matrix group). Translate statement only, ending with := by sorry. -/
theorem isSub

args.content:
import Mathlib

open Matrix

variable (n : ℕ) (R : Type*)

section diagonal_subgroup

variable [CommRing R]

/-- D(n) = set of diagonal invertible matrices in M_n(R), viewed as a subset of the units. -/
def D_units : Set (Units (Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) R)) :=
  fun u => ∀ i j, i ≠ j → (u : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) R) i j = 0

/-- The set D(n) of diagonal invertible matrices is a subgroup of the unit group of M_n(R). -/
theorem D_is_subgroup : IsSubgroup (fun u : Units (Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) R) => ∀ i j, i ≠ j → (u : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) R) i j = 0) := by sorry

end diagonal_subgroup

args.content:
import Mathlib

open Matrix

section diagonal_subgroup

variable {n : ℕ} {R : Type*} [CommRing R]

/-- D(n) as a subset of the unit group of M_n(R): invertible diagonal matrices. -/
def D_units : Set (Units (Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) R)) :=
  { u | ∀ i j, i ≠ j → (u : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) R) i j = 0 }

/-- The set D(n) of diagonal invertible matrices is a subgroup of the unit group of M_n(R). -/
theorem D_units_subgroup : Subgroup (Units (Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) R)) := by sorry

end diagonal_subgroup

import Mathlib

open Matrix

section diagonal_subgroup

variable {n : ℕ} {R : Type*} [CommRing R]

/-- D(n) as a subset of the unit group of M_n(R): invertible diagonal matrices. -/
def D_units : Set (Units (Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) R)) :=
  { u | ∀ i j, i ≠ j → (u : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) R) i j = 0 }

/-- The set D(n) of diagonal invertible matrices is a subgroup of the unit group of M_n(R). -/
def D_units_subgroup : Subgroup (Units (Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) R)) := by sorry

end diagonal_subgroup
